Gabriele Abbati | 2017

About

I am a first year D.Phil. (Ph.D.) student in the Machine Learning Research Group at the University of Oxford, supervised by Michael A Osborne.
I am funded through a Oxford - Google DeepMind Graduate Scholarship.

I am mainly interested in Bayesian optimization and Bayesian Neural Networks, but I also want to explore the benefits that Bayesian frameworks can bring to Deep Learning.

My CV is available for download.
